DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to determine the impact of serving size and the addition of sugar on the glycemic response elicited by oatmeal compared to that elicited by cream of rice cereal.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Serving Size and Addition of Sugar on the Glycemic Response Elicited by Oatmeal
